div.p:
The thrid dai of Junij the yer' of god et cetera lxxxv Alexander of chavmer yungar' is becumin souerty
be the faith of his body in presence of the aldirman and ballies in Jugement that mariory the spous'
of vmquhile alexander stokar' salbe scathles and vnvext of twa chartiris deliuerit be hir'
til alexander liel a chartir of the land liand in the ovirkirkgate of the quhilk scho has Junct
feftment and the tudir chartir of viij s' of annuel the tempilland liand beyond the Denburn
brig

Androw murison has constitute and ordanit thomas of chavmer his procuratour til persew and
recovir a meyr analiit fra him the quhilk meyr Robert yungar of achincloich has
intromettit with and haldis / the said androw haldand ferm and stabil et cetera

the ferd dai of June / Dauid menyes eldar be his awne grant was chargit be the
aldirman and ballies tocontent and pay til Anne prat the spous' of Jhone mason ten
s' acht til hir for pennyworthis tane to sanct nicolace masons within terme of law

Item the assise has ordanit that Androw goldsmyth sal pay til Janet of lesly the spous'
of patrik strathachin xvj s' for the price of a siluer belt within lachful tyme And
the said Janet has constitute James lesly and androw culan eldar hir procuratouris coniunct
ly and seueralie to ressaue the said payment fra androw goldsmyth and gif nede be to
ger pryis' his gudis for the samyn

In the court haldin be the aldirman and androw branche ane of the ballies of abirdene in
the tolbuthe the viij dai of Junij the yer' forsaid / thom symson callit Jerdyn convict
be ane assise is adiugit in amerciament for the wranguis' strublance of alexander Wode
vndir nycht and to amend as law wil And the aldirman be the deliuerence of the
assise has ordanit that quhat tym the said thom symson be fundin strublar' of
ony man or woman vndir nycht in tym tocum or a common' nychtwalkar' / that he salbe
put for a day in the goif and syne bannyst the toun'

the assise has ordanit betuix alexander liel and mariory the spous' of vmquhile
Alexander stokar' / that the said alexander liel as procuratour til Anne stokar' sal quytcla
me and discharge the said mariory of al areschip and gudis barnis partis and clame
anent the testment of alexander stokar / for the quhilk the said mariory sal gif and pay
to the said alexander liel atour the some' before gevin til him xxtj s' and ane suffi
cent par' of schetis and a coveryn that be gude next the best in the hous' / and
he salbe at his vantage of the chartiris folowing of the newburgh before
quhat Juge he plesis And alexander chavmer yungar is cumin souerty tokepe
the said mariory scathles and vnclamit of alexander stokaris ayris or ony vthiris
haffand interess' / tuiching the areschip and testment or ony vthir thingis abouewritin

Item alexander liel is ordanit til ansuer' on monundai cum xv dais to the borgh strekin
on him be William goldmyth of the wranguis' withhaldin of xxiij s' with the mare et cetera

The x dai of Junij the yer' of god et cetera lxxxv . Johne of meldrum present to the aldirman balies
and counsale our Souerane lord the kingis lettres / of the quhilkis the copy folowis
James be the grace of god king of Scottis To the Aldirman ballies thesaurare counsale
and communite of our burgh of Abirdene that now ar and that sal happin tobe for the tyme
greting Wit ye ws tohaue gevin and grantit and be thir our lettres gevis and grantis to our'
louit familiar' seruitur' Johne of meldrum for al the dayis of his life . for his seruice done
and tobe done to ws / the sowme of threttene markis of vsual money of our Realme yerly
tobe payit to him of our burow malis and watirmalis of our said burgh be you the
Intromettouris tharewith at twa vsuale termes in the yer' Witsonday and mertymes in winter
be evin porcionis And the first terme of the payment of the said sovme / tobegin at mertymes
last bipast before the date hereof And sa furth the said Jhone tobe pait yerly of the
said sovme enduring his lifetyme at mertymes and Witsonday as said is Quharfor
We charge straitly and commandis you the aldirman balyeis thesaurare consale and communite
of our said burgh of abirdene intromettouris with the burow malis and watirmalis of the sammyn
that now ar / and that salhappin tobe for the tym / That ye thankfully content and pay
to the said Jhone of meldrum yerly enduring his lifetyme in his fee / the said sowme of
threttene merkis of the said burowmalis and watirmalis at the termes forsaidis And in speciale
of the said terme of mertymes last bypast as for the first terme of his entre to the
payment of the sammyn The quhilk some' of xiij merkis being yerly payit be you to
the said Jhone enduring his life tyme as is abouewrittin / We charge our' Ressauour'
generale and auditouris of oure chekker' that salbe for the tyme / toallow / the sammyn
thankfully to you in your comptis / ye schewing to thaim the said Johnis lettres of Ressate
thareof yerly apon compt for your warand And thir our lettres being sene be yow and
anys present in our chekker' before our' said Ressauour and auditouris and registrate in our
chekker rollis deliueris thaim agane to the said Johne to remane with him for al the
dayis of his life vndir al the hiest pain and charge that eftir may folou / gevin vndir
our priue seil at Edinburgh the xviij day of februar' the yere of god jM iiijC
lxxxiiij yeris And of our' Regne the xxv yer'
James R
Hec est vera copia littere domini nostri Regis per me notarium subscriptum fideliter collocianata cum
principalibus et originalibus litteris in omnibus concordantibus in plana curia si confirmata perlect' et per scribam
curie publice mecum ut premittitur collocianat' testes manu propria vna cum subscriptione mea et
Signo manuali et cetera
Robertus leis notarius publicus

Curia tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene per prepositum et andream branche vnum ballivorum eiusdem
xiijo die Junij anno Domini et cetera lxxxvto

quo die thomas de mawmurson conuictus per as
sisam adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione et violenta wlneracione Dauidis
galichtly et emendare eidem ad visum proborum virorum Et dictus Dauid accusatus
quitus factus fuit per eandem assisam de perturbio dicti thome / Et pro emenda dabit dictus thomas
pro curacione prefati David xx s' / et ipsemet David pro dampno per ipsum sustento alios xx s' soluendos infra terminum Juris

Eodem die assisa ordinauit quod Andreas lammynton' satisfaciet Johannj lammynton
fratri suo de xix s' sibi debitis infra terminum Juris / et pro iniusta detencione eorundem
adiudicatur in amerciamento

Alexander menyes deuenit plegius legalis pro Thoma de mawmurson quod Dauid galycht
lie erit indempnis de eo et parte sua aliter quod per viam Juris Et idem Dauid inuenit
Willelmum blindsel plegium legalem de indempnitate prefati thome ut supra

Iniungitur andree lammynton per andream branche ballivum ex ordinacione assise quod de
certo non intromittat per se aut sororem suam seu quemcumque seruitorem suum cum domino Thoma hervy aut
orto suo seu hospicio nec dampnum aut nocumentum sibi faciat sub pena que competere
poterit in hac parte

div.head: Inquisicionis nomina
div.p:
Alexander menyes Robertus blindsel Willelmus blindsel thomas de marr' Dauid mathoson Walterus
achneve gilbertus morison Jacobus craik ricardus hil andreas Wenton' David prat David hil
Ranaldus talyour Willelmus de tulidef et thomas de culan Quj Jurati dicunt quod nesciunt si quondam
alexander coilly frater elizabeth coilly obiit vltra vestitus et sasitus ut de feodo et cetera de vno annuo
redditu xij solidorum petit' per dictam elizabeth de quadam terra Jacente in vico de le scule
hil inter terram thome benyn ex occidentali parte et terram quondam thome club ex orientali parte Et
nesciunt si dicta elizabeth sit legittima et propinquior heres eiusdem quondam alexandri fratris suj de
dicto annuo redditu / quia reperiunt eundem in manibus Roberti de Kintor filii et heredis quondam
Ricardi de Kintor burgensis de abirdene per sasinam et possessionem hereditas sibi inde tradit' per thomam
de fife tunc vnum ballivorum de abirdene per spacium octo annorum et vltra secundum tenorem littere
testimonialis desuper confecte

The xv dai of Junij Jhon of narn webstar was in amerciament for the wranguis' pas
sing fra his mastir Wil of Wentonnis seruice and ordanit be ane assise toserve
him for this yer' And gif eftirwart he wald serue ony man in this toun for met
and fee / the assise fyndis that he suld serue the said William Wenton' before ony vthir

In curia tenta per ballivos in pretorio de abirdene xvijo die mensis Junij predicti / thomas cha
mer tinctor et alexander pardoner quilibet in amerciamento pro perturbio adinuicem

Androw louson convict be ane assise is adiugit in amerciament for the wranguis' haldin
of xxiiij s' for a hous' mail fra Dauid marr' / and to pay him within lachful tyme / And
anens the gudis takin oute of the hous' / the assise has ordanit / samekil as Dauid
marr' can preve suld haf remainit in the hous' that androw louson has takin away
that the said androw sal recompens the said Dauid tharfor

Curia legalis tenta per balliuos burgi de abirdene in pretorio eiusdem xxo die Junij
anno Dominj et cetera lxxxv /

quo die Johannes scaw adiudicatur in amerciamento quia assisa reperit quod iniuste
perturbavit cristinam fresal in domo sua sub cilencio noctis

Assignatur Willelmo leis quod compareat die veneris proximo peremptorie ad respondendum andree louson
super plegio per eum porrecto sinautem erit debitor firme cuiusdam domus de qua dictus
andreas asserit eundem Willelmum se releuare debere iuxta ordinacionem ballivorum ex decreto curie

Item ballivi assignaverunt Willelmo portar hodie ad quindenam ad respondendum plegio super eum
inuento per Johannem colison pro iniusta detencione x marcarum

xxvijo die Junij anno quo supra In curia ballivorum / Willelmus philp adiudicatur in amerciamento
quia iniuste perturbavit Donaldum valanty et emendabit eidem ad visum proborum virorum

Item dictus Willelmus philp in amerciamento pro iniusta porrectione plegij super Robertum prat de iniusta
intromissione cum vna quarta prout compertum fuit per assisam

The ballies be the decrete of the court has ordanit William of leis tobe
warnit tilansuer' to the borgh strekin on him be Androw louson on thurisdai next
tocum in the hour' of caus' as dai peremptour / or tobe condampnit in the hous' mail
clamit be the said androw / nocht againstanding that thir wes a dai peremptour assignit
of before and continewit to this dai

In the court haldin be the ballies of abirdene in the tolbuthe the last dai of Junij the yer'
of god et cetera lxxxv Androw lowson folowit be ane borgh Wil of leis that he acht tofree
him of sa fer mail as he occupiit a hous' the quhilk was fundin the said androwis
tak be ane assise and wrangis that he dois it nocht / the quhilk borgh / the assise fand
of vail / and that Wil of leis had occupiit that hous' fra candilmes to Witsundai be
his awn grant / and gif androw louson can preve that the said William occupijt the hous'
langar' he sal pay him the mail corespondand thareftir to the yeris' mail And the
said William is adiugit in amerciament et cetera

Curia legalis tenta per balliuos burgi de abirdene in pretorio eiusdem quarto die Julij
anno Dominj et cetera lxxxv /

quo die Willelmus portar primo die vocatus ad sectam Johannis colison
pro iniusta detencione x marcarum / non comparuit Ideo precipitur alexandro chamer seriendo capere districtum et cetera
et premunire eundem Willelmum ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam secundum diem huius processus

The v dai of July forsaid In the court haldin be the ballies in the tolbuthe / Anent the action
persewit be Walter achneve againis mastir Richard crafurd with bath thare consentis thir
personis vndirwritin that is tosay Alexander menyes Robert blindsel Jhon of Knollis alexander
rede and gilbert the vaus ar chosin and sworn in ane assise todecide and end the said
action at the cuming of William futhes / and quhare ane of thir persons falyeis and beis
nocht present in the tym totak ane vthir in thare sted / and tofynd quhethir the gudis clamit
be the said Walter achneve be his propir gudis or nocht / and the parties ar oblist tovndirly thir deliuerence

the assise has ordanit that thom of marr' sal mak full wyne of twa stickis of rynche
wyne sald be Alexander rede and thom of marris wif his factouris til William moyses
and Jhon colison his dettour

The communitee has consentit tobe taxit til a certane contribucion tobe gevin to the organar'
at the avise and ordinance of Alexander menyes Robert blindsel Jhon of Knollis alexander
rede Jhone of culan thom prat and Robert prat tharto chosin and sworn

viijo die Julij mariota filia Johannis talyour in amerciamento pro iniusta perturbacione Agnetis edward'
et tenetur emendare ad visum proborum virorum

the assise findis that Dauid ego sal pay to marion glenny xij s' iij d' leis for a hous'
mail / And for the wranguis' withhaldin of the said xij s' ij d' he is adiugit in amerciament
and tocontent hir within lachful tyme

xjo die Julij predicti coram Andrea branche vno ballivorum de abirdene Johannes colison
constituit Johannem de Knollis Willelmum blindsel Willelmum moyses et dominum alexandrum voket
capellanum coniunctim et divisim suos procuratores / ad prosequendum legittime actionem suam
processus aduersus Willelmum portar in absencia sua / Ipso promittens de rato et cetera

In the court haldin be alexander rede and androw branche twa of the ballies of abirdene
in the tolbuthe the xiiij dai of July the yer' et cetera lxxxv . Comperit gilbert vaus
procuratour for Johne fichet / and gert rede the act of the deliuerence of ane
assise betuix the said Johne and Jhone rolyn / And protestit opinly that sen the
yere and dai was gayn / that quhat certificacion com in tyme tocum suld turn
the said Johne fichet to na preiudice . sen it is falyeit of the production of
the certificacion within the terme assignit eftir the tenor of the act made tharuppon

Curia tenta per balliuos de Abirdene in pretorio eiusdem xv die Julij anno Domini et cetera
lxxxv

the same dai comperit ser Robert leis chaplan of Sanct sebastianis altar me
nand him hevily that marioun glenny withhaldis fra him iiij s' yerlie of annuel
pertening to the said altar / And suppois' the said ser Robert diuers' tymes has askit
the said annuel and has brocht officeris with him topoynd tharfor as yit he can get
na payment nor na gudis topoynd tharfor bot stekis hir durris that he can get na
intres in gret preiudice and scath of him as he allegis / quharfor the said ser Robert
solempnitly protestit / that the withhalding of the said annuel rent of yeris and termes
bigane turn him nor his successouris to na preiudice nor scath in tym cuming

Item the said dai comperit in Jugement James chavmer son and ayr to vmquhile thom
of chavmer burges of montros and of his awne propir motive has chosin til his
curate and governour Alexander chavmer seriand burges of abirdene his eme' anent al
and sundry landis and gudis mouabil and immouable pertening til him be the deces' of his
fadir quhil he cum til lachful age / And toput his landis and gudis toprofite of
the said barne induring the said tyme vnreuocable to that tyme til endure
before thir witnes alexander rede androw branche twa of the ballies gilbert the vaus
William moyses Johne the vaus ser Walter yung' ser' Robert leis notar and vthir sundry
Bessy seruand to Johne sincler' in amerciament for strublance of thom of meldrum in worde

In the court haldin be the ballies in the tolbuthe the xvj dai of Jule the yer' forsaid
the assise has ordanit that thom of culan sal pay and deliuer til Wil philp vj
mettis of salt within lachful tyme the said William payand the fraght tharof

the samen dai the action betuix ser John' of ruthirfurd and Jhone of culan anent x merkis
clamit be the said ser Johne for his wattir mail of the yer' bigane Is continuit be the
ballies at the desir' of the persons chosin with the consent of the parties tharuppon / quhil tusday
cum xv dais in like fourm as it is now becaus' thai declarit thai couthe nocht deliuer
this matir withoute the avis' of the aldirman and the hail consale And thir ar the persons
chosin apon this caus' / Alexander menyes James lesly Robert blindsel Jhon of Knollis
gilbert chamer William the hay gilbert the vaus thomas prat Ranald talyour androw
murray eldar and Sym of gardin
Curia legalis tenta per ballivos de abirdene in pretorio eiusdem xviijo die Julij anno quo supra

quo die Willelmus portar secundo die vocatus ad sectam procuratoris Johannis colison pro x marcis
non comparuit Ideo precipitur alexandro chamour seriando quod capto districto a dicto Willelmo ipsum summoneat
ad proximum diem legalem tanquam tercium diem processus comparuit dictus Willelmus

The assis' has deliuerit be the mouthe of gilbert the vaus' that Jhone colison or his
procuratouris sal sufficently preif on tusdai cum xv dais that Wil portar consentit to the subscrip
cion of the obligacion producit in Jugement be the procuratouris of the said John'

huchon of Wellis and thom of Knox officer' of torry before the ballies in Jugement
ar' becumin ful dettouris topay Jhone of Knollis ane barrel of salmond within
xx daies or ellis toger pryis' til him tharfor samekil gudis as is wourth j barrel
of salmond

the samyn dai William leith of the bernys has constitute his procuratouris ser Alexander
voket gilbert Johne the vaus' Dauid marr' Wil anffray and ser John' of leith con
iunctly and seueralie tofolou and persew be process' of law ane land liand vndir
the castelhil in faute of payment of a yerly annuel rent of ten s' acht til
him heritably of the samyn And in al vthiris actionis and caus' concerning him
within this burgh / promittande tohald ferm and stabil quhat thing his saidis
procuratouris or ony of thaim lachfully ledis tobe done in his name et cetera

William leith of bernys alexander menyes and thom of culan at becumin til alexander
rede ane of the ballies law borowis for the said lard of bernys his sonnes
thare party and complicis that the nichburis and inhabitantis of this burgh sal be vnscathit
of thaim vthirwais than law wil / and in speciale androw branche balye and Wil blindsel
And tocompere to morn at ix houris toansuer' and vndirly the law to ony party
that is plaintwis' on thaim

Item Androw branche has fundin thomas fife law borgh and William blindsel
has fundin alexander sanchar law borgh that the said lard of bernys sonnis and
thare party salbe vndistrublit of thaim and thare party bot be way of law
And to entir to morn at ix houris to vndirly the law as said is

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta per balliuos in pretorio eiusdem xix die Julij
anno Dominj et cetera lxxxv

div.head: Assisa
div.p:
Thomas de fife thomas prat gilbertus vaus Johannes stephinson andreas murray senior
Johne glenmaluin alexander hay andreas Wenton alexander nachty Ricardus talyour Symon de
gardin Johannes chepman Willelmus hay robertus prat et Willelmus andirson

The samen dai William leith of bernys Alexander menyes and thom of culan ar becumin
souerty for the said lard of bernys William his son and thare complicis that thai sal
compere before the aldirman ballies and consel in the tolbuthe of this burgh on viij
daies warning eftir the hamecuming of the aldirman til ansuer' and vndirly the law
for ony strublance done be thaim to the toune / And tohaf remede of law in
like wise of ony personis that thai ar plaintwis' of

The said dai the lard of bernys for him / William and george his sonis with thar complicis on the
ta part / And androw branche the balye and Wilyeam blindsel on the tudir part / twiching the strub
lance made within this burgh has summittit and referrit thame to the personis beforewritin
chosin apon the asisse of the said matir and oblist thaim tovndirly thare deliuerence in fauora
bil maner withoute rigour of Justice . The quhilk assis' deliueris and ordanis that the
said lard of bernys sonnis William and george with thar complicis . sal ask Androw branche and
William blindsel forgifnes of the offens done to thaim within the said burgh and topromit
be the faith' of thar bodiis that thai sal keip thare kyndnes and fauouris in tym tocum to the saidis
Androw branche and William blindsel / and that the fornemit persons sal stand in hartly kynd
nes in tym cuming And in likewis' Robert of culan and William blindsel anent the strub
lance commitit betuix thaim / And betuix Robert of culan and William moyses rychtsua
has referrit thame to the deliuerence of the assis' as said is And the samyn assis'
ordanis that Robert of culan sal ask William blindsel and Wilyam moyses forgifnes
of the offens commitit be him againis thame / and that he and his frendis sal stand in
kyndnes and hartlie tendirnes fra hyne furth to thaim and into thare defence quhare
evyr thai fynd thame And quhilk of the parties before expremyt falyeis in the
keping of the ordinance and poyntis forsaidis sal pay at the command' of the maist part
of the assis' with avis' of the counsale being with thaim for the tym that is tosay mastir
Androw liel thesaurar' of abirdene maistir Jhone the hay parson of turref Alexander menyes
and Robert blindsel twenty pundis to Sanct Nicolace wark / And heirto the parties
ar' oblist be the faith' of thare bodiis
Curia tenta per ballivos in pretorio xxvj die Julij anno Dominj et cetera lxxxv /

quo die Dauid gethan
conuictus per assisam adiudicatur in amerciamento quia iniuste perturbavit alexandrum bevirla Et idem alexander
in amerciamento pro perturbio dicti Dauidis in verbo vnde pro emenda assisa ordinavit quod prefatus Dauid
dabit iij s' fabrice beati nicholai et cetera Idem Dauid in amerciamento pro perturbio henrici owrum

Item Willelmus andirson in amerciamento quia conuictus fuit de iniusta lesione Dauidis bevirla Et
per assisam inungitur eidem Willelmo ad soluendum pro curacione dicti Dauidis / et ad dandum eidem
in partem emende v s' argenti / et j libr' cere ad lumen Sancti sanguinis / partibus
predictis ad standum ordinacionj assise fideliter obligatis
Curia tenta in pretorio de abirdene per balliuos eiusdem secundo die Augusti anno et cetera lxxxv

The quhilk dai comperit in Jugement Johne colison topreve that Wil portar consentit
to the subscripcion of ane obligacion be the quhilk he folowit the said William of
ten merkis like as he was ordanit be ane assise And the said Jhone producit the
forsaid William him self for the said preif and gef it him in his aith / the quhilk
William portar the gret aith sworn deponit and declarit / that he consentit nocht
to the making nor subscripcion of the said obligacion / and swa he was made
quyte of Jhon' colisonis chalance

the ballies has assignit til Jhone of tuliboy friday next tocum peremptourly til
answer' to the challance of Dauid galichtly

Item the said dai It was decretit be the court / that maistir Richart craufurd the
quhilk was oblist tilhaf producit sufficent quittance or document of Wille rede anent
the payment of xij s' g' and has falyeit tharin sal pay the said some of xij s' g'
til Androw rede of badfothellis within terme of law like as it was ordanit be
ane act / made tharuppon of before

The thrid dai of august the yer' forsaid / Wat thomson convict be ane assise is
adiugit in amerciament of the court for the wranguis' folowing of low Watson of xiiij
merkis and demj and the said low quite of his clame

Item the saidis Waltir and low ilkane of thaim in amerciament for strublance of vthir in word
And the assise has ordanit that the said Walter quhilk was fundin the maist forfau
tar' sal pay for amendis to the halyblude lycht j li' of wax

In the court haldin be the ballies of abirdene in the tolbuthe the ix dai of august the yer'
aboue writin Jhone smyth convict be ane assise was adiugit in amerciament of the
court for the wrangwis' withhalding of a barel of tar fra Androw ewynson and
tocontent him within lachful tyme

The xj dai of the said moneth of august In the balye court haldin in the tolbuthe
of Abirdene It was fundin and deliuerit be ane sworn assise / that vmquhile Androw
rettre assignit til his spous' / now the spous' of William abirdour' the thrid part
of a nettis fisching of the pot for the termes of the last general assedacion made vndir
the common' seil of this burgh

the samyn dai It was ordanit / that William moyses be his awn' grant sal deliuer
til John rettre son and ayr til vmquhile androw rettre a siluer peis' of vij vncis and demj
gif it may be gottin within xv dais / or ellis xij s' for ilke vnce like as it
was prysit be certane personis sworn' thareto that is tosay John' Wormot William
goldsmyth and gilbert riburn

The assis' has ordanit that thom symson for the iniuris done be him til maistir William
colison and James colison sal pay x s' to the kirk wark / pleg' tharfor Androw symson

And that the saidis maistir William and James colison sal pay rychtswa x s' for iniuris done
be thaim to the said thomas / and alexander chamer yungar is souerty for the said payment
And gif it be fundin in tym cuming that Thom symson iniuris Johne colison or his brethir
in blasfemacion in word or deid he sal pay to the kirk wark of abirdene x merkis
And rychtsua gif thai forfaute againis the said thomas as said is . thai sal pay in
like wyis' ten merkis to the kirk wark

Item the said thomas symson has fundin William of Kintor law borgh that mastir William
colison and James colison his bruthir and thare party salbe vnscathit of him and his party
vthirwais than be way of law And alexander chavmer the son is becumin law borgh for
the forsaidis mastir William and James colison and thare party / that thom symson and his party
salbe vnskathit bot as law wil et cetera

The vj dai of Septembre the yer' of god et cetera lxxxv comperit before the aldirman and
ballies in Jugement in the tolbuthe James clerk procuratour til Androw Kynninmond
and askit tobe kend til a croft liand besyde the Justice myln / and a land
in the greyn eftir the tenour of our Souerane lordis lettres . And thare comperit Alexander
Irvyn of the Drum and allegit him possessour of the said croft / and ser Jhone
of ruthirfurd allegit that he was in possession' of the said land / And the
aldirman and ballies with consent of the said James assignit til the saidis Alexander
and ser Jhone Wednisdai the xiiij dai of Septembre instant toschaw before
thame thare richtis and documentis of the forsaidis croft and land

the samyn dai James clerk lachful procuratour til Androw Kynninmond grantit him
tilhaf resauit fra Elspat Dakir the spous' of vmquhile androw scot of the
ayrschip of the said androw Kynninmond / ane brew caldron j almery a cvche
bed / j cruke thre peis' of pewdir veschel j kyst ane ark and a
coveryn of a cop / of the quhilkis gudis he has dischargit the said elspat
for evyr et cetera

xiijo die Septembris anno predicto Johannes menyes inuenit Andream andirson plegium legalem
de indempnitate Johannis fichet aliter quam per viam Juris Et gilbertus vaus deuenit plegius similiter
pro Johanne fichet quod Johannes menyeis erit indempnis aliter quam Jura volunt

The samyn dai the aldirman and ballies has assignit monundai cum viij dais til alexander
sanchar topreve sufficently that Sandris vrquhard than balye of fores layd in ane
barrel of salmond of the said alexander sancharis and in his name in William gillissonis schip

the assise deliueris / gif William gelisson skippar wil cum with ane or twa of his childir
with him on Wednisdai or thurisday before the aldirman or ballies and depone the
gret aith that Wil of garriachis barrel of salmond was anys stowit vndir the owyr
lop of his schip / and thareftir tane vp apon the owyrlop for saufty of the merchandis gudis
the said Wil of garriach sal ask the lot tharof at the merchandis and the skippar And gif the said barel
of salmond was nevir put vndir the owyrlop / thai fynd the skippar dettour for it

Assisa Johannes de culan Johannes Wormot alexander de marr' Willelmus de Kyntor Dauid
mathoson Ricardus culan Johannes vaus Walterus achneif Robertus prat Willelmus de garriach
Willelmus de futhes Symon de gardin Willelmus andirson Willelmus de Dunbrek The
quhilk assis' chosin and sworn todecide the borgh strekin be Johne menyeis on John'
fichet of the wrangwis' intrometting with xj barellis of salmond / fand Johne fichet
na wrangar' as yit et cetera

xxo die Septembris anno Dominj et cetera lxxxv Johannes grig venit coram Andrea branche
vno ballivorum huius burgi et constituit Alexandrum rede Thomam fife and Johannem
Wormot suos procuratores coniunctim et divisim in omnibus causis tam per ipsum quam contra ipsum motis
seu monendis agendis / et defendendis se terras et bona sua Ipso promittens de rato et cetera

xxijdo die mensis septembris predicti Alexander menyeis Jacobus lesly Robertus blindsel Johannes
de Knollis et thomas prat electi fuerunt et iurati auditores compoti Johannes de
culan et Walteri aghneif magistrorum fabrice ecclesie et cetera

In the court haldin be Alexander of chamer aldirman and alexander rede ane of the ballies of
abirdene in the tolbuthe the xxiij dai of Septembre / Wil of lammynton convict be ane
assise was adiugit in amerciament for the wrangwis' distrublance of a pur' woman and
spoliacion of hir nuttis vndir nycht / and torestore hir gudis and amend as law wil
And als' the said wil was accusit and convict as said is for nychtwalkin ffor the
quhilk the assis' has ordanit gif evir he beis fundin a nychtwalkar in tym cuming
that he salbe bannyst fra this toune

Item the assise has ordanit that Jhone scherar' fleschar' resset nocht sic gestis again
as Wil of lammynton and his complicis fra ix houris vndir nycht bot gif he stand
for thare dedis vndir pane of bannysing as forsaid is

The samyn dai alexander rede ane of the ballies be the decrete of the court has
chargit Johne colison to content and pay til Johne fichet the some' of xxxiiij
merkis quhilk he grantit him tilhaf in depois' and keping on the behalf
of Johne rolyn within terme of law or ellis toschaw laghful diffessance quhilk
he suld nocht pay the said sowme' til Johne fichet

It is ordanit and statute be the counsale that in tym cuming al gudis that cumis to this
burgh be aventur' of sey sal first be entirit and offerit to the aldriman or ballies
and certane of the counsale at the leist in the name of the toune or ony man
by ony part tharof / and that na nichbur by sic gudis before thai be entirit as
said is vndir the pain of xl s' tobe tane and gevin to Sanct Nicholace wark And
that al sic gudis of auentur cumand be sey salbe bocht and resauit be the wattir
met et cetera

The xxiiij dai of Septembre the yer' et cetera lxxxv Robert blindsel alexander rede John' Wor
mot Dauid mathoson androw murray eldar Walter achneif and Robert prat ar chosin
be the counsale and communite and sworn totax the some' of vijxx and x li' to the
expensis of the personis that passis to the asseging of berwik / this tax is
defalkit til jC li'

In the court haldin be the ballies in the tolbuthe of abirdene the xxvj dai of Sep
tembre the yer' forsaid Alexander sanchar' producit ane testimonial vndir the seil of Ro
bert of Douglas ane of the ballies of the burgh of fores anent a barel of
salmond quhilk he tuke topreve this dai was layd in his name in William
gillisonis schip And the said testimonial contenit that Alexander vrchard balye of fores
James thomson burges of the samyn and nicol of mar' the gret aith sworn declarit that
thai saw and stude by quhil Johne Wisman at the biddin of the said alexander vrchard
and of the behalf of alexander sanchar put into William gelissonis schip a hammyr
barel of salmond four' dais or the said William sayllit last oute of fyndirin And
tharuppon the court auisit decretit . that the said testimonial was of vail and sufficent
anent the said preif assignit til alexander sanchar And that Wilyam gelisson skippar was
dettour til him the said alexander sanchar for the barrel of salmond tobe pait within terme
of law

the samyn dai the assise fand and declarit thom Kerd quyte of the clame of a
swerd persewit be thom menyes

the assise has assignit til William rate Wednisdai next tocum to preif that
he payt to Johne Kervour' quham god assolye for the making of ane almery
clamit be him fra Androw ancroft before the said John' decessit et cetera
